name: Disarranged Crossword
description:
A new type of crossword puzzle for word game lovers!


You are given all the letters in each crossword, but you can only see letters in its wrong placement. To finish the puzzle you will need to follow the across or down clues and drag and drop the blue colored letters to form the answer. Words are both left to right and up to down (classic crosswords). Arranging the crosswords can be surprisingly tough!

It features bright and colorful graphics that will help you to reach the correct position of a letter: Green shows the correct position of a letter, red designates the incorrect position of a letter and blue lets you to drag and drop the selected letter.

Four puzzle levels let you learn to play gradually. Can you conquer the expert level with its extra-long words?


We made this app free so that you can test it without having to buy anything. It comes with 24 free puzzles—6 puzzles in each of the four levels. There are 1000 puzzles available to purchase, but the 24 free puzzles might just keep you busy for a while!


Features:

- A new twist on crosswords for word game lovers

- 4 levels of difficulty

- Bright and colorful graphics to evaluate correct placement of letters

- navigate across or down clues

- 1000 puzzles (24 are free)

- See your progress instantly in the puzzle book

- you can reset the puzzle so that puzzle can be solved again

- A fun way to keep your brain sharp!

** INSTANT FUN **
* No sign-up required
* Simple gameplay
*No rules to learn
* Just download and play
* No Ads!
